comments:
+++ This bug was initially created as a clone of Bug #172777 +++

When editing some ANT-files a "selection resolve failed" info message appears in the error log. This is similar to Bug #172777, despite the fact that the created stacktrace is different (thats why I opened a new bug). 

The important thing about that bug is that both the undo history and syntax highlighting is broken afterwards (thats why I marked this bug as major).

The stacktrace:
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap.get(Unknown Source)

Should be fixed now and I added a test, but  I could not replicate the failure.  It would be great if you could verify the fix with Fridya's dev build.

I could not find fridays dev build for eclipse 3.2, as http://download.eclipse.org/technology/mylar/update-site/dev/e3.2 points to the 2.0 M2 version. I did not upgrade to eclipse 3.3 up to now (cause its not final), could you please specify a location where to find dev builds for 3.2?

We don't currently have a 3.2 dev build and will not have one until early next week since we are ramping down around the next Eclipse 3.3 milestone.  For the frequency of 3.2 dev builds please see http://wiki.eclipse.org/index.php/Mylar_User_Guide#Releases
